statements: SELECT * FROM user_authentication;
SELECT username, security_question FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT password_hash FROM user_authentication WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT username, password_hash FROM user_authentication ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM user_authentication;
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, security_question FROM user_authentication WHERE password_hash = 'abc123';
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE security_answer LIKE '%secret%';
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_authentication ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_authentication WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM sessions ORDER BY expiration_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username ='john_doe';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'John%';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT * FROM sessions WHERE expiration_time > NOW();
SELECT user_id, COUNT(session_id) as num_sessions FROM sessions GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_sessions > 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username
SELECT user_id, password_hash FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%'
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 2
SELECT permission_name FROM user_permissions
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'JohnDoe';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles r ON u.user_id = r.role_id;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_sessions WHERE login_time > '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, log_time FROM user_logs WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT DISTINCT security_id, user_id FROM account_security;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, log_info FROM user_logs ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT password_strength, last_password_change FROM account_security WHERE last_password_change < '2022-01-01';
SELECT u.username, s.login_time, l.log_info FROM users u JOIN user_sessions s ON u.user_id = s.user_id JOIN user_logs l ON u.user_id = l.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT session_id, login_time, logout_time FROM user_sessions ORDER BY login_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, notification_emails, two_factor_auth FROM account_settings WHERE two_factor_auth = true;
SELECT * FROM login_history WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY login_time;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id > 100 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, password_hash FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users JOIN account_settings ON users.user_id = account_settings.user_id WHERE account_settings.two_factor_auth = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, login_time FROM user_sessions WHERE login_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY login_time ASC;
